items.headline: Why Social Security beats anything insurance companies offer
items.summary_en: The same inflation-adjusted annuity benefits would be prohibitively expensive to obtain in the private market.

items.headline: Walmart says tariffs are raising costs, but it’s trying to avoid price increases — for now
items.summary_en: “We’re keeping our prices as low as we can for as long as we can,” Walmart CEO Doug McMillon said in regard to the impact of tariffs.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Lumber prices are tumbling. Here’s what that means for the housing market now.
items.summary_en: Many home builders, contractors and retailers wagered that higher U.S. tariffs on imports would boost the cost of lumber, while lower interest rates would lift demand for the building material. Those bets have failed to pay off.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: There’s a slow-motion crisis in bonds — and this bearish strategist thinks it will hit stocks
items.summary_en: Societe Generale’s Albert Edwards says the move higher in long government bond yields has been “relentless,” and investors have ignored it.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: The U.S.-E.U. tariff deal is now on paper, and it includes LNG and AI-chip purchases
items.summary_en: The European Union and the United States have published a joint statement, spelling out in writing the terms of the trade deal reached between U.S. President Donald Trump and European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen last month.

items.headline: Tesla rejoins ranks of hedge-fund favorites for first time in three years
items.summary_en: The favorite stocks of hedge funds have outperformed the broader market this year, and for the first time since 2022, Tesla is one of them, an analysis from Goldman Sachs found.

items.summary_en: “I do not expect or need anything from my parents.”

items.headline: ‘The money went into his account’: Is my father trying to swindle me out of my grandparents’ $800K home?

items.headline: How AI is squeezing the housing market
items.summary_en: Artificial intelligence — which a new report claims doesn’t even work for businesses 95% of the time — is the cause of the housing market rut.
